site_updates.text: Added a theme inspired by Frutiger Aero and Vista. It feels calm
Added a few old blog posts from previous versions of the site & brought back the Lyric Status section
Added "It won't be perfect. Do it anyway", refreshed the home page
Major overhaul! Migrated the site to Astro and added an initial highlights system!
Got Webmentions working (I think...)! Also finished up the first batch of highlights.
Found and added a few, ahem, *vintage* cards to the site from the early days of blake.earth. There are still more out there...
Made a little app with val.town to make it easier to manage my highlights. Lots of fun. I'll probably make a guestbook or comments section with it next!
Briefly added comments and then decided to leave things up to webmentions for now. I'm a sucker for decentralization.

Added TinaCMS on top of Astro for easier content management. Added draft functionality to the Astro configuration. Added some new books and highlights. Re-did the styling of the website to be more Earth-y.
